channel.title: Importing a demo – Xây dựng website thương mại điện tử

item.title: Importing a demo
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Hi ,

I couldn’t import a demo page using one click import , even the import manually doesn’t work and the pages doesn’t show widgets

please advise.

item.title: Reply To: Importing a demo
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Hi,

Follow this documentation to import the demo as like this page. After successfully importing the demo content, you will find all the pages in your WordPress admin dashboard’s Pages menu. Find your desired homepage there and start editing this page with Elementor.

Also, you can set your Homepage demo as the Frontpage of your website from Settings > Reading

Thanks

item.title: Reply To: Importing a demo
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Hi,

Deactivate and delete the old version of the plugin from the Plugins > Installed Plugins list. Then install the plugin from Appearance > Instal Plugins.

Read more on the doc here

Thanks

item.title: Reply To: Importing a demo
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
That’s mean that some of the WooCommerce template files are out of date. You will get the updated WooCommerce template files in the next update of the theme.

Thanks
